methods.name: initialize

args.name: title
args.desc: - Opinion title (becomes ASA name, max 32 chars)

args.name: textSize
args.desc: - Size of opinion text in bytes (box is pre-allocated)

args.name: opinionType
args.desc: - Opinion type (exactly 32 bytes, right-padded with zeros)

methods.desc:
Initializes the opinion with funding, title, text size, duration, type, and optional URL
Must be called with a payment transaction in the same group
Text content is written separately via writeChunk calls (also in the same group)

methods.name: writeChunk

args.name: offset
args.desc: - Byte offset within the box to start writing

args.name: data
args.desc: - Chunk of text data to write

methods.desc:
Writes a chunk of opinion text into the pre-allocated box
Must be called after initialize and before finalize

methods.name: sign
methods.desc:
Signs the opinion (validates atomic group with ASA opt-in)
Must be called as first txn in atomic group where second txn is ASA opt-in

args.name: newEndRound
args.desc: - New end round (must be greater than current)

methods.name: finalize
methods.desc:
Finalizes the opinion (anyone can call after end round)
Removes ASA manager and sends remaining balance to caller

sourceInfo.errorMessage: invalid number of bytes for arc4.dynamic_array<arc4.uint8>
invalid number of bytes for arc4.uint64
